---
title: "How to install archive package from ULR"
author: "Ruoyuan Li"
date: "March 1, 2018"
output: pdf_document
---

* install Rtools from [Rtools](https://cran.r-project.org/bin/windows/Rtools/)

* install devtools from cran for using install_ulr function

* find the ulr for the archive package, for mine, pgmm's link is [pgmm_1.2.tar.gz](https://cran.r-project.org/bin/windows/Rtools/).

* using command: install_ulr("https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/Archive/pgmm/pgmm_1.2.tar.gz"), and done.
